title: Peak power demand hovering near projected 235 GW this month amid severe heat wave
description: India's peak power demand nears 235 GW in May due to excessive use of cooling appliances during severe heat waves. The power ministry data shows peak power demand met has reached 233 GW on May 6, compared to 221.42 GW a year ago. The peak power supply touched 229.
